works.description: During the first four months of my employment, I received training on the mathematics required for credit transactions and the skills required for server-side development.
I was involved in the operation, maintenance, and enhancement of the server side, including data integration between internal systems and BaaS.

Initially, I joined as a member of the UIUX team, and after 4 months, I took the lead position. In order to improve the UIUX of the existing app, I am implementing development, testing, and release in a design sprint format.
As a member of the new FX application implementation team, I am involved in front-end development, and am mainly considering on architecture and technology selection without relying on the backend.
